title: Property condition disclosures (seller)
dataVerified: Seller name, buyer name, property address, condition details, defects
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Domain binding verifies seller/real estate agent. Standard forms suitable for OCR. Transaction transparency. Liability protection. Prevents undisclosed defect fraud.
